name: Iconic Football Quotes
description: Football quotes which are iconic, which hopefully, brighten your day!
author: Apollo-Brownlee

quotes.quote: When people succeed, it is because of hard work.
quotes.author: Diego Maradona

quotes.quote: Talent without working hard is nothing.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: Life is like soccer; You need goals.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can't score a goal if you don't take a shot.
quotes.author: Johan Cruijff

quotes.quote: It's hard to beat someone who never quits.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If I have to make a tackle then I have already made a mistake.
quotes.author: Paolo Maldini

quotes.quote: Pele called me the greatest footballer in the world. That is my ultimate salute to my life.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.quote: It's no shame to fall down. But it is a shame to stay down.
quotes.author: Miroslav Klose
